backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing fields, tasks, user profiles, and authorization with CRUD operations and permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI background-opacity fixes to affected components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of frontend files with brief descriptions of functionality and recent enhancements.
frontend/docs/deploy-and-localdev-regres: Comprehensive checklist for validating builds, deployments, login flow, and core frontend functionality.
frontend/docs/field-create-failure-repro: Steps to reproduce and verify behavior for field creation failures, mainly for anonymous users.
frontend/docs/production-redeploy-runboo: Runbook describing steps, prerequisites, and safeguards for performing a clean production redeploy.
frontend/docs/production-smoke-check-pro: Short smoke test procedure for verifying critical path and basic CRUD functionality after production redeploy.
frontend/docs/production-smoke-check-res: Template for recording pass/fail results of the production smoke check procedure.
frontend/docs/profile-save-failure-repro: Explains the root cause of profile save failures, how to reproduce them, and the fixes added to guards, error handling, and UI.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point creating the root element and loading the bootstrap and main app scripts.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component handling authentication, actor and profile loading, boot error detection, and retry/logout flows.
frontend/src/bootstrap/bootFallback.ts: Implements a pre-React error fallback UI with sanitization, diagnostics, and copyable error details.
frontend/src/bootstrap/preReactGlobals.t: Sets up global shims and environment variables before React loads and initializes boot fallback handlers.
frontend/src/components/AllTasksView.tsx: Renders all tasks with search, sorting, and field lookup, using task and field query data.
frontend/src/components/CreateFieldDialo: Modal for creating a field with name and background selection, handling authentication and actor readiness before submitting.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskDialog: Modal for creating a task with attributes, duration, and dependencies, submitting via useCreateTask.
Modal for editing a fieldâ€™s name, icon, color, and background, resetting values on open and submitting updates.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Modal for editing task details including attributes, duration, dependencies, and optionally moving it to another field.
frontend/src/components/FieldCard.tsx: Displays a field summary card with icon, task count, and averaged attributes, styled using field appearance settings.
frontend/src/components/FieldDetailError: Error boundary that catches rendering errors in field detail views and shows a recovery UI with back and retry actions.
Displays details for a field, including sortable and searchable tasks, field metrics, and dialogs for creating, editing, and deleting fields or tasks.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the app header with theme toggle, user profile menu, and logout handling using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/ImportDataConfir: A confirmation dialog that warns users before overwriting all existing data during an import operation.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Displays a login screen highlighting app features and prompting users to authenticate via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for entering and saving a user's name during initial setup, with status messages and backend readiness checks.
frontend/src/components/RecoverableBootE: Shows an error screen for recoverable boot failures with retry, logout, and detailed diagnostics display.
frontend/src/components/SortDirectionTog: A button with tooltip that toggles between ascending and descending sort directions.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Renders a task card with completion, editing, deletion, and attribute display, using toast-based undo and dependency lookup.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout, and identity loading via context and AuthClient integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, fields, tasks, and exports using a resilient actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Builds a fault-tolerant backend actor that retries on network errors and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark theme tokens and field background color variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page handling field/task views, authentication state, filtering, sorting, and import/export logic.
frontend/src/utils/bootErrorMessages.ts: Utility helpers to extract error text and classify IC-related errors into friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/downloadJson.ts: Exports arbitrary data as a downloadable JSON file with BigInt-safe serialization.
frontend/src/utils/duration.ts: Provides duration conversion utilities between minutes, hours, and days, plus human-readable formatting.
Normalizes export-user-data errors into categories with user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/fieldAppearance.ts: Defines selectable icon and color sets for fields and resolves icon/color values safely.
Defines background color options for field cards with helpers for lookup and CSS variable mapping.
frontend/src/utils/fieldCreationErrors.t: Normalizes field-creation errors, detecting login, authorization, and profile issues.
frontend/src/utils/parseExportPayload.ts: Validates and converts exported JSON into typed payloads, restoring Principals and BigInt fields and applying defaults for missing field properties.
frontend/src/utils/profileSaveErrors.ts: Normalizes profile save errors into categorized, user-friendly messages, handling login, actor state, authorization, and unknown issues.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including support for hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state describing requirements and issues focused on fixing transparent backgrounds on task cards and modals.
